# pickupLocation

**Instance Property**

The user’s starting location.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var pickupLocation: CLPlacemark? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to determine what vehicles are in the vicinity. Combine this property with the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INListRideOptionsIntent/dropOffLocation] property to determine pricing and timing information.

## Getting the Pickup and Drop Off Locations

- **dropOffLocation**: The user’s destination.
